trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_1<tab>An adventurer, I see. After an elite mark, are you?
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_A1_000_2<tab>Tell me about the rank B elite mark. (White Joker)
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_A1_000_3<tab>Tell me about the rank A elite mark. (Forneus)
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_A1_000_4<tab>Tell me about the rank S elite mark. (Laideronnette)
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_10<tab>I'm just a hunter trying to do her bit for law and order. These elite marks are a menace to the region.
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_11<tab>If we slay the quarry, we'll be awarded Allied Seals by the Eorzean Alliance.
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_12<tab>There's plenty of marks for everyone. Ask me about the elite marks in this area─I know them practically by heart.
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_13<tab>You know these elite marks are ranked according to danger, I presume? Most would find a rank S specimen hard to find, let alone kill.
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_20<tab>“White Joker. So called because of many innocents fatally charmed by this squirrel's distinct white coat.
TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_21<tab>“Thanks to predation by other rodents, only the fittest and most vicious of squirrels survive to adulthood.”

TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_30<tab>“Forneus. While long believed to be naught but the stuff of fear-babes, sightings of the creature in these parts have been many though apocryphal, including those at the notorious Haukke Manor.”

TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_31<tab>Well, it turned out that particular sighting was real enough. That dark demon has been making leaves red in the forest for a while. Beware Forneus, adventurer.

TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_40<tab>“Laideronnette, the red serpent of the glade. One of many monstrosities to manifest themselves following the Calamity, Laideronnette's attacks coincide with rainfall, a fact which demonologists deem significant.

TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_41<tab>“Most experts agree that the loathsome serpent is the residuum of Laideronnette the wainwright's red-haired daughter, who was orphaned in the Calamity and fell into grief both bitter and formless, given to shrieking that all the world should weep with her.”

TEXT_REGFSTNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00194_MOBHUNTERF1F1_000_42<tab>Colorful. All you need know is that a giant red serpent has been feeding on man-flesh in the forests. Best to put it out of its misery, don't you think?
